text: Plunder Road is a 1957 American crime movie directed by Hubert Cornfield and starring Gene Raymond, Jeanne Cooper, Wayne Morris, Elisha Cook Jr., Stafford Repp, Steven Ritch, Nora Hayden, Helene Heigh. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1957 crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Plunder Road
